name: Beta Soul
description:
In the far future, scientists develop the first AI with self-awareness. Without being able to confine the AI, everything goes wrong. In the dawn of a new era, robots start to control the world.

You  are taking control of  a small robot with a really advanced AI. Trying to survive will be difficult but through your adventure you will unlock your inner potential and unveil what the world truly hides.

Beta Soul is an autobattle RPG and every stage involves something different. You can also try your hand on a quick pace challenge mode. Tread carefully and take calculated risks .

D-pad - Navigation in menus

A - Confirmation

B - To go back or reject
